about_the_game:
LEAVES - The Return - Supporter Pack


The supporter pack contains a selection of goodies for LEAVES - The Return, for all those who want to go the extra mile to support the developer of the game.

Contents

  • The LEAVES - The Return Strategy Guide in a completely illustrated form
  • The LEAVES - The Return Strategy Guide - walkthrough version (in English and German)
  • Collection of LEAVES - The Return wallpapers
  • The LEAVES soundtrack

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support!
